attributes.title: this app was the worst. it didn’t work😩😩

attributes.review: just no. and i’m not trying to be a “karen” but this app was the worst. terrible service. terrible viewpoints. NEEDS TO BE DELETED ASAP!!!!
attributes.title: worst app created

attributes.review: Got this app with positive intentions. But then my phone became super slow and glitches all the time! I had to get a new phone! App was paid for my Trump? Trump should BUY ME a new phone! So now my cat is barking at my mailman while he pees on the bushes and my pickle delivery guy flew to Africa to see the polar bears and now he is the fifth letter in the alphabet on Mars!
attributes.title: The comment

attributes.review: I opened up this app to see the scariest thing I have ever seen in my whole life a scary looking Cheeto man looking back at me. It gave me a heart attack and sent me in to anaphylactic shock lucky I was able to get to the hospital and make it through. But I believe that this man should have to pay for my hospital bills.
attributes.title: I almost died

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and the first thing i saw was a nude picture of trump!!🤮🤮 then they stole my pet rat named Joe Exotic and they stole my microwaveable hamster and my fish that I water every single day! They also stole my grandma and I am so sad that she is gone. I am so outraged and disappointed. My life is ruined and now I need to put bleach in my eyes
attributes.title: This App is Horrible.

attributes.review: Stop trying to take away TikTok a lot of people  love that app and they already have our info so what’s the point of taking it away you we are not gonna get our information back so what’s the point of taking down so that why I’m giving this one star.
attributes.title: Don’t take away TikTok

attributes.review: Okay so like why is there a fat ugly orange pig on the app? Like isn’t that weird?? and also why is it named trumpet? horrible app I hate it so much and also it makes my phone turn orange !!!!! Can you believe that? And why is there a literal orange on the front of the app ??)?! Explain that to me . Ewww!! 🤢🤢🤢🤢 the app is also very smelly . Horrible app.
attributes.title: Horrible!

attributes.review:
Opened the app and was immediately asked for all of my personal information! Sorry I don’t want to get hacked. I was also insulted on it for being a proud Christian. This app better not be counting on my support.
Extremely disappointed by the amount of FAKE NEWS on it.
attributes.title: Remove from the App Store!😤

attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps I have seen. The set up of the app is the worst that I have seen from all social media apps I’ve been on. It took my almost a week to download, this is with pretty good internet.... After downloading it I wondered why the rating was so low. Now I understand. 1/5.
attributes.title: Pro reviewer here

attributes.review: I opened this app and right away felt like my Rights as a US citizen were being violated. Asking for My location and my phone number I thought this was America not Germany Cira 1930. This App reminds me of the president, poorly made and about as useful as a nipple on a male boar. 0/10 would not recommend.
attributes.title: The best app to infringe on my rights
